name: Deepest Dungeon (JellySandwich)
description:
Made for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023. Theme: "Duality"

When you kill the monsters, you get an additional piece of flavor-text that describes your horrific actions against these innocent creatures. See...duality. 

There are bugs. I worked on it as much as I could with a full-time job. If it messes up royally, just restart.

Thanks to the following for their music/sound effects:

Jute for https://opengameart.org/content/foot-walking-step-sounds-on-stone-water-snow-woo...

https://opengameart.org/content/items-door-fire-weapon-hits

Independent.nu for https://opengameart.org/content/16-button-clicks

HaelDB for https://opengameart.org/content/rat-sewer

remaxim for https://opengameart.org/content/3-melee-sounds
